reviews.review_msg: Lectures were entertaining to watch Don show off different tools in Max. Max is not my favourite program, but Don made it somewhat bearable. Don seems to really care about his students as if you asked to re-explain something in lecture or lab, he would take the time to make sure you understood it. Made all examples available for further tests

He doesn't give you part marks at all, not very understanding and doesn't care about your success, will reject your claim at all costs. Tough grader and does not seem to be interested in conveying subject matter in an understandable fashion. Bad professor in terms of helping students when seeking help.

This prof is useless. He has next to 0 knowledge on how to answer student's questions. If it is not on his answer key he simply does not know. He has not once answered a question clearly. He will make you do redos on all assignments then wait a week before you write an exam to provide feedback on all the redos. The final exam is a joke. Good luck!

He is super unclear with what he wants or does not want from you, and fails to provide feedback on numerous avenues for assignments. Midterms and finals are super unfair and he criticizes any answer you get. GOOD LUCK

He is unbelievably unprofessional and does not provide clear guidance to his work. He does not teach the course and uses an answer guide to mark essay questions. It does not matter if your answers are correct or not, if he does not see your answers on his answer guide he will mark you incorrect.

I had Sinclair for two online courses. He is probably the most difficult but rewarding biology prof I've ever had. He is a tough marker but really cares about his students - for instance, he always allowed me to resubmit questions for full marks after telling me exactly what I did wrong. Very nice, quick to mark homework and exams.

Dr. Sinclair is a great instructor. The course itself was really hard combined with his hard marking, but you learn all of the topics in depth. His feedback is really helpful and helps you understand the content. He is also approachable by email and is willing to clarify any issues. After hard studying and memorizing, the exams are fair.

Horrible! I didn't do so well on the midterm so I went to see him to see what I can do to improve. And he basically just shrugged his shoulders and said that people who get lower marks contribute to the distribution. I finished the course but I had a sour taste for genetics. 2 years later I went on to get an A in Genetic Analysis with a better prof

There's no doubt his lectures are boring, but he's a really nice prof! I was just under the cut-off for the next grade and he bumped me up because i did significantly better on the final exam than the midterms! I don't know any other prof that would have done that. He seems to really care about his students and wants them to do well.

His exam questions are usually from the lecture notes and the tutorial questions. That being said, this is not an easy class because there is A LOT of memorization! However, his notes are really good so you don't need the textbook. He is always open to helping people with any questions. Nice guy, he's sort of like a cute grandpa.

His ability to lecture is not so great (boring) however he is a very nice professor - seems to be willing to help students succeed. His tests are based on his PowerPoint slides, as well as tutorial assignments, so really pay attention to those! Midterm and final was fair, not too hard, but not too easy. Having a good memory would definitely help.

Overly detailed lecture slides and ridiculously dry lectures. If you are an auditory learner avoid taking the class with him. That being said his tests were very fair, and he posted great review packages. One of those classes where you need to learn everything outside of lecture.
Really nice prof! He really cares about his students and puts a lot thought into his lectures. His exams are also straightforward and easy to do well on if you study his lecture notes.

A GREAT prof! Tells you exactly what he expects you to know on the exams. Notes are fairly concise and to the point. Some lectures can be fairly dry, but ultimately if the material at times is dry, then that's to be expected. He's overall quite generous with marks,and his exam are very fair.

He is generous with marking and his test is very straight forward from the lecture slides  (but the exams are not easy). In Genetics, spend more time on problem solving and go to your tutorial. Dr.Sinclaire doesn't try to trick you in the exams. Everything is in the notes and he tells you what things you should study. This is why I like him.
Course is so easy, just listen to recorded lectures online (because its nearly impossible to stay awake during class) and your good to go.

He's such a cute old man!  His midterms weren't too bad, but he's really picky with stuff. Study the practice midterms he gives out because a lot of his exam questions are based on those.  Overall all this course was okay.

This is the worst class I have ever take. I wont take anymore courses with him I thought i did well on my midterm and i ended up failing after all my hard work. if you miss one small thing big marks are taken off. It is not fair at all

Great course, great professor, although his lectures are a bit on the dry side. If you fall asleep easy, you may want to stick to another professor. But on the bright side, he records his lectures so that helps A LOT! Warning: TA's will be your biggest obstacle. Tutorial questions very difficult. Good practice for exams though. Like!
easy course, very easy marking....

Great prof! Lectures are fairly dry, but he is VERY informative. All lecture recordings are online, which I found to be EXTREMELY helpful. He is very willing answer questions and clarify difficult topics for you. Midterm/final are straight from the notes! His review slides cover the main focuses on his exams. Dont worry if u find tutorial sets hard
Really nice prof.Study off lecture notes, and make sure not to get lazy by the end of the course. Final exam is a must study for.

Do not buy the textbook for the course if you have him! All you need to study for his midterms/final is his lecture notes and the practice problems. Read/complete those and you'll do fine in this course! He's a super nice professor, and easily approachable. The lectures are super boring, but overall worth going to. Tutorials however were useless.

This prof is great if you like to read just the slides and don't like to read the text. However, he spends just a little more time looking at his notes than the students and interacting with them. Also, he goes thru examples so make sure you pay great attention then!!but in general very nice and approachable!
His notes/slides are good. Just memorize his notes and you'll do very well in this class! :) He's a little monotone but he's very knowledgeable and approachable. His exams are VERY fair!

Professor was really fair, can't blame him for my performance. Lecture notes were great, maybe not the most interesting prof but without attending lecture, if you strictly study his notes, you could ace this course. Wish i had a second shot at it

Overall a very good prof. He is very concerned about clarity, which is great. If he doesn't think something is clear in his notes, he will reword it and send the updated version to students. His notes are good and he has lots of office hours. In lectures he makes it clear what is important. There's a lot to know, but that's the course for ya.
First midterm was fair, class average was high. Second midterm was a bit on the tricky side, but it was still fair. Overall a great prof :)

Professor is tough but fair I would say. He won't give special consideration to people (basically because people usually don't deserve it, and it would be unfair anyways). Text book use is very low, so just study what he gives you in the notes. Exams can be a bit tough if you don't study well. He kind of reminds me a bit of george carlin.

Awesome prof. Lectures are boring, but that is the only negative I can think of. His notes are extremely clear on what you have to know and what he'll test you on. Exams are very fair. Go to his office hours & you'll realize that he's one of the most knowledgeable profs who can give you tons of helpful tips and info. Highly Recommended!
great prof! very nice and helpful... this is a prof who actually cares, has tons of office hours and always willing to help. marking was fair, labs were easy, lectures were kind of boring.

One of the nicest profs I've had. He's very helpful and approachable. His lectures can be dull, due partly to his monotone voice and partly to the fact that we already know 75% of the lecture material. His weekly quizzes can be were fair and so was his final. Note that his lectures normally take 1 hour, not 2.

Avoid if possible. Notes look like a disorganized patchwork of old powerpoint slides from past semesters. Lectures were extremely dull. Exams were unreasonably difficult. Labs weren't bad due to great lab staff. With any luck I'll be able to avoid him for any future academic work.
This professor is worst teacher I have ever met in my life!  He is a really bad bad professor that treat the student unfairly!
for the love of god, wait until kovalyova teaches this course and save yourselves a ton of work and effort.
Very great. I waited a year to take MBB 309 with him. He helps a lot, labs are very easy, and he gives you all the dilutions and calculations you need. easy marking, easy quizes, and great overall.

I recommend him because you can just study his letured and do well. You really donot need to study the complicated stuff in book. Also his midterms and especially final was pretty easy. I  did not study as much I should have been but still I got a B
good prof. warning: very boring! but he knows his stuff and knows how to teach. study his notes and you'll do perfectly fine on midterm and finals!
Organized online lecture notes, obviously knowledgeable about the material but his lectures doesn't add a lot to the notes.  Course is very straight forward, grading is fair, exams were easy enough.
boring lectures but not difficult to understand; only one paper to write; exams werent too bad but he can be a picky marker (his TAs were VERY hard markers)

yep, very boring prof, no matter how hard i try, i still manage to zone out for the majority of the class. but straight forward, midterms are fair, just know the stuff he goes over in lecture and you'll do fine

Lecture - nothing special; Lab - Pretty good. The TAs/prof don't mark for lab results, so even if you screw up you won't be penalized. Prof - Very approachable and helpful. Recommendation: Take the course with this prof whenever you get the chance.
Alright guy, SUPER boring.  Fair tests and a NICE guy just REALLY REALLY boring.

I just gotta give full credit for this prof. His notes are tidy(sort of), he is a friendly person, and most importantly, he gives out straight-forward exams! I got myself an A there. Just study for his notes, and that will gurantee you a pass!
Easy prof + Clear + online notes + online lecture tape. Eventhough i fell asleep in class all the time (due to his monotone), the lecture can be accessed at anytime.
Nice guy.  Very available and willing to give help.  Fair exams, no tricks; questions either from lecture notes or recommended problems in text.  Text book is a must and do all recommended problems.

Lecture notes are great study tools, but if you go to lecture to listen to him read them to you in a monotone voice get ready to sleep. His exams are fair though and very approachable for help. Always tells you what you need to know and what you don't for exams which is always a plus.
Bo-ring, Bo-ring, B0-RING prof
Exams are fair and straightforward...... the questions are directly from his lecture notes, so as long as you study his notes hard, you should be fine.

People were saying that he is hard for Mbb222, after I taking it!he is boring in class, and he look Scientist ?? but, he grades marks so fair and exam is pretty much from lecture note, and he told you what is coving in exam and what is not. so is

This guy is the best prof - very fair and concise.  He is intelligent, knowledgeable, considerate, etc. and actually cares about the course. Anyone who thinks otherwise is either a complete dumb ass or doesn't know what they're talking about.

BORING! This guy cannot explain ANYTHING clearly. His notes are hard to read and lack logic and clarity.  When you come to his office hours with a simple question, you will never get a straight answer; he will stare at you and ask you questions back.
lectures are pretty borning but if you memorize the notes you will do great in the class. Get over 90% on final and automatic A+ (always nice).Pretty clear on information, just monotone.
So boring! long exams!
Not bad, material in the course is pretty straightforward so not too hard to do well.  His quiz/midterms are fair (although a bit long) but final was hard!  Lectures = naptime.
crazy hairstyle, fair grader

Dr. Sinclair's notes are very straightforward... they just have to be memorized and you can do great in the course. However, the lectures are very boring and easy to fall asleep in since he is very monotone.
His midterms were fair....but final is hard and long!!
awesome guy, and nice hair! hehe
Makes me fall aspleep almost every lecture. :(
Very helpful and pleasant
No Comments
